hero.description: I’m a passionate front-end web developer crafting user-friendly and visually engaging websites using modern technologies and best practices.

about.paragraph-1: I’m a self-taught learner who completed the Codecademy Front-End Engineer course and Aurora Development's full front-end program. I’ve also taken several smaller courses on Udemy.
about.paragraph-2: My hobbies include web design, travel, photography, karate, and cinema. I value creativity and am always open to collaborating on inspiring projects.

development.title: Web Development
development.description: Creating responsive websites and web applications with modern frameworks.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: Designing intuitive user interfaces and seamless user experiences.

management.title: Project Management
management.description: Leading projects from conception to completion with agile methodologies.

projects.mainParagraph: Here are some of my recent projects. Each project was carefully crafted with attention to detail, performance and user experience.

1.title: RockBand Landing Page 1
1.description: A beautiful landing page app using React and Tailwind.

2.title: Portfolio Website 2
2.description: Personal portfolio built with React and styled-components.

3.title: Portfolio Website 3
3.description: Personal portfolio built with React and styled-components.

contact.mainParagraph: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new opportunities.
